dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Alright, so, um, did you catch the news about that leaked Morgan Stanley call on Tesla? Adam Jonas, the analyst, you know, the big Tesla bull?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Alright, so, um, did you catch the news about that leaked Morgan Stanley call on Tesla? Adam Jonas, the analyst, you know, the big Tesla bull?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Morgan Stanley equity analyst Adam Jonas, a long-time Tesla bull whos grown increasingly bearish, discussed concerns about the company in a nearly one-hour call with investors that was recorded and leaked online Wednesday.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, I totally did! [chuckles] It’s all over the place. Apparently, he had this like, almost hour-long call with investors, and it got, uh, recorded and leaked.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, I totally did! It's all over the place. Apparently, he had this like, almost hour-long call with investors, and it got, uh, recorded and leaked.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Morgan Stanley equity analyst Adam Jonas, a long-time Tesla bull whos grown increasingly bearish, discussed concerns about the company in a nearly one-hour call with investors that was recorded and leaked online Wednesday.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right? And the big takeaway, from what I'm seeing, is that demand for Teslas is, like, skyrocketing? Especially in China.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? And the big takeaway, from what I'm seeing, is that demand for Teslas is, like, skyrocketing? Especially in China.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Issues include signs that demand for Teslas electric cars is slipping, sales in China may not be as robust as hoped...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, exactly! He was saying sales in China are just blowing past expectations, and the upcoming Model Y crossover? Uh, incredibly compelling, according to him.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, exactly! He was saying sales in China are just blowing past expectations, and the upcoming Model Y crossover? Uh, incredibly compelling, according to him.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Issues include signs that demand for Teslas electric cars is slipping, sales in China may not be as robust as hoped and the upcoming Model Y crossover isnt sufficiently compelling...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, total positive vibes then? Because I remember late 2018, it was still a "growth story," but now he's saying it's, like, more of a "credit story and restructuring story." That's a shift.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, total positive vibes then? Because I remember late twenty eighteen, it was still a growth story, but now he's saying it's, like, more of a credit story and restructuring story. That's a shift.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As recently as late 2018, Tesla was seen as a growth story, Jonas said on the call. ... it's seen more as a distressed credit story and restructuring story.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It is, but he's also saying they're flush with cash now, supply lags demand, and everyone loves the Model Y. It's, uh, overwhelmingly positive feedback he's getting.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It is, but he's also saying they're flush with cash now, supply lags demand, and everyone loves the Model Y. It's, uh, overwhelmingly positive feedback he's getting.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Today, supply exceeds demand, they're burning cash. Nobody cares about the Model Y. Tesla is not seen as a growth story, at least the feedback we were getting, which is quite one-sided ... it's seen more as a distressed credit story and restructuring story.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, but here's where I get a bit confused. This week, Jonas also *raised* his best-case price for Tesla shares... to just ten dollars. Ten! From a bull?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, but here's where I get a bit confused. This week, Jonas also raised his best-case price for Tesla shares... to just ten dollars. Ten! From a bull?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The leaked comments come on the heels of a research note this week in which Jonas slashed his worst-case price for Tesla shares to just $10...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [laughs nervously] I know, right? That’s the wild part. I guess, even if they exceed sales goals in China by 50%, his *best-case* scenario is still... very conservative.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I know, right? That's the wild part. I guess, even if they exceed sales goals in China by fifty percent, his best-case scenario is still... very conservative.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...slashed his worst-case price for Tesla shares to just $10, which could be triggered by factors including missing estimated sales goals for China by as much as 50%.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Very conservative! Especially considering the stock jumped 6% just on Wednesday, hitting almost $193. It's up, uh, 42% this year!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Very conservative! Especially considering the stock jumped six percent just on Wednesday, hitting almost one hundred ninety three dollars. It's up, uh, forty two percent this year!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The stock plunged 6% in Nasdaq trading on Wednesday to $192.73, its lowest since December 2016. Tesla is down 42% this year.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, so the market clearly isn't, um, following that $10 best-case. Tesla actually soared into the black in Q1, with deliveries of the S, X, and 3 all above forecast.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, so the market clearly isn't, um, following that ten dollar best-case. Tesla actually soared into the black in Q1, with deliveries of the S, X, and three all above forecast.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Tesla fell back into the red in the first quarter, hit by lower than forecast deliveries of Model S, X and 3 electric cars.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right, so they're making money, demand is high, but the analyst who's a "bull" is saying ten bucks, best case. It's a head-scratcher.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, so they're making money, demand is high, but the analyst who's a bull is saying ten bucks, best case. It's a head-scratcher.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It really is. And, uh, don't forget, Tesla just raised another $2.7 billion in debt and equity this month. Guess who was among the investment banks participating? Morgan Stanley.

dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Jonass tough outlook also comes just after Tesla raised $2.7 billion this month in its latest debt and equity offering. Curiously, Morgan Stanley was among the investment banks participating in the sale of those offerings.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] Of course they were! So Jonas is, like, involved in their financing, but also giving this really low best-case price.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Of course they were! So Jonas is, like, involved in their financing, but also giving this really low best-case price.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: He noted they seized an opportunity to raise funds late last year when their finances looked stronger, but, uh, it wasn't for strategic involvement. Just institutional.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He noted they seized an opportunity to raise funds late last year when their finances looked stronger, but, uh, it wasn't for strategic involvement. Just institutional.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In his discussion, Jonas noted that Tesla passed up an opportunity to raise funds late last year when its finances briefly looked stronger.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, a financial dance, then. It's a lot of mixed signals, but the market, for now, seems to be pretty bullish on Tesla.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, a financial dance, then. It's a lot of mixed signals, but the market, for now, seems to be pretty bullish on Tesla.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The stock plunged 6% in Nasdaq trading on Wednesday to $192.73, its lowest since December 2016. Tesla is down 42% this year.
